downloadDescription: Naiad is a prototype platform for performing incremental, iterative, and interactive data-parallel computation. Last published: September 24, 2012.
detailsSection: Naiad is a prototype platform for performing incremental, iterative, and interactive data-parallel computation. Naiad exposes an interface similar to that of Language Integrated Queries (LINQ) but provides a runtime capable of responding rapidly to incremental changes in inputs, for complex, circular data flows. This download contains the initial release of Naiad, as well as several example projects demonstrating Naiad's support for incremental, iterative data-parallel computations.
